returns._0: bool True if address can claim

claim().details: Users can claim tokens after the cooldown period

params._tokenAddress: Address of the deployed SydneyToken contract

params.amount: Amount of tokens to fund (in wei)

returns._0: uint256 Seconds remaining (0 if can claim now)

canClaim(address).notice: Check if an address can claim tokens

claimAmount().notice: Amount of tokens each user can claim per request

claimCount(address).notice: Track number of claims per address

lastClaimTime(address).notice: Track last claim time for each user

maxClaimsPerAddress().notice: Maximum number of claims per address

setClaimAmount(uint256).notice: Set the claim amount per request

setCooldown(uint256).notice: Set the cooldown period between claims

setMaxClaimsPerAddress(uint256).notice: Set maximum claims per address (0 = unlimited)

timeUntilNextClaim(address).notice: Get time remaining until next claim for an address
